::Kluster/Repressor/Rex::

Kluster stares at scanner reports, watching the Ark launch off into 
space. "What in the pit is going on?" he asks no one in particular.

Kluster sighs. The Ark wasn't the biggest issue right now. The biggest 
issue was the Alliance attack.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex rolls out of the way of Repressor's shots and jumps to his feet. 
He wasn't in the mood for being backstabbed.

Rex aims his missile launcher and fires back at Repressor.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Dollen::
> 
> He saw that the rock slide did nothing.
> "Ok." 
> He gets out of StarScream. Then the gust blows him back.
> He sees Megatron.
> "Die!"
> He fires his machine guns.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He sees Feline. He is about to open a link, but he then sees a huge
> shooting star. He looks at it with his enhanced optics.
> "Correct me if I'm wrong, but that was the Ark!"
> He gets back on track and openes the link.
> "Feline, its Hot Rod. Do you read?"
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He reloaded his weapon, and then shot once more at Angel Prime.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He followed Killfest. 
> "There is enough bots here, I guess. we can go wherever you were 
going
> to
